body_html:
Oh, we have missed this breaking change in the migration guide! Thanks for pointing out, we will fix it!

Here is an example PR that can fix your loading logic to fix the . in the name of the module pytorch/vision#474

cc @SsnL is there an easier way for users to load old state-dicts that contains dots?

body:
Oh, we have missed this breaking change in the migration guide! Thanks for pointing out, we will fix it!

Here is an example PR that can fix your loading logic to fix the `.` in the name of the module https://github.com/pytorch/vision/pull/474

cc @SsnL is there an easier way for users to load old state-dicts that contains dots?
